```{r seq, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, }

library(knitr)
library(Biostrings)
library(seqinr)
fasta<-"ref/lfPVT-S5000.fasta"
seq<-as.character(readDNAStringSet(fasta))


linelength<-30
seqdf<-as.data.frame(splitseq(s2c(seq),word=linelength))
colnames(seqdf)<-NULL
rownames(seqdf)<-seq(from=1,by=linelength,length.out=dim(seqdf)[1])
kable(seqdf,row.names=T)
```
